overview: Paranormal investigator Alan Megargle embarks on a journey across the United States to make contact with the legendary Bigfoot. Through his travels his experiences compound and his perspective shifts. Could Sasquatch be more than just an elusive primate?
tagline: Paranormal investigator Alan Megargle embarks on a 3-year journey that leads to contact with the Spiritual Bigfoot.
title: Spiritual Bigfoot: A Personal Journey
